# I.Setup
Libraries needed:
```{r, results = "hide"}
library(Biobase)
library(GEOquery)
library(Seurat)
library(CellChat)
library(dplyr)
library(patchwork)
```


load data (human data from CellChat paper, with annotation)
```{r}
load(url("https://ndownloader.figshare.com/files/25950872"))

husk_an.data = data_humanSkin$data
husk_an.meta = data_humanSkin$meta
husk_an <- CreateSeuratObject(counts = husk_an.data, meta.data = husk_an.meta)
```
